articles.author: Liv Klingert
articles.title: Belarusian sprinter given Polish visa after refusing to board flight home - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Poland will do ‘whatever is necessary’ to help Olympic sprinter, says government official.
articles.content:
A Belarusian Olympic athlete who refused to board a flight home from Tokyo after criticizing team officials has been granted a humanitarian visa by Poland.
Krystsina Tsimanouskaya entered the Polish… [+1336 chars]
